data.eml:eml: A new species of the genus Typhlocharis Dieck, 1869 (Coleoptera, Carabidae) from Portugal

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Artur R. M. Serrano, Carlos A. S. Aguiar (2017): A new species of the genus Typhlocharis Dieck, 1869 (Coleoptera, Carabidae) from Portugal. Revue suisse de Zoologie 124 (1): 39-46, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.322662
